diff_act: 1.attempt to re-establish the connection if possible
2.provide an audible and visual indication to the driver that the call has been lost due to geographical constraints
3.pick up the handset by the driver
4.terminate the call by the calling driver
5.continue the call until terminated by the calling driver

regen.absent_element: visual indication when the system is not able to connect the call
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a visual indication to the driver if the system is not able to connect the call.

label: If the system is not able to connect the call, an audible and visual indication shall be provided to the driver.
absence: the visual indication shall be provided
